title: Thomas Keller, Chef And Restaurateur
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks with Thomas Keller, author and owner of several Michelin-ranked restaurants. Harris also speaks with Jessamyn Rodriguez, founder of Hot Bread Kitchen.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks with Thomas Keller, author and owner of several Michelin-ranked restaurants. Harris also speaks with Jessamyn Rodriguez, founder of Hot Bread Kitchen.
